  • Konstruktordetails

    • Treatment

      public Treatment(long pid, long cid, LocalDate date, LocalTime begin, LocalTime end, String description, String remarks)
      Constructor to initiate an object of class Treatment with the given parameter. Use this constructor to initiate objects, which are not persisted yet, because it will not have a treatment id (tid).
      Parameter:
      pid - Id of the treated patient.
      cid - Id of the responsible caregiver.
      date - Date of the Treatment.
      begin - Time of the start of the treatment in format "hh:MM"
      end - Time of the end of the treatment in format "hh:MM".
      description - Description of the treatment.
      remarks - Remarks to the treatment.

    • Treatment

      public Treatment(long tid, long pid, long cid, LocalDate date, LocalTime begin, LocalTime end, String description, String remarks)
      Constructor to initiate an object of class Treatment with the given parameter. Use this constructor to initiate objects, which are already persisted and have a treatment id (tid).
      Parameter:
      tid - Id of the treatment.
      pid - Id of the treated patient.
      cid - Id of the responsible caregiver.
      date - Date of the Treatment.
      begin - Time of the start of the treatment in format "hh:MM"
      end - Time of the end of the treatment in format "hh:MM".
      description - Description of the treatment.
      remarks - Remarks to the treatment.
